mapper.select: select user_id,status ,title,description,content,e.name cate_name,a.id blog_id,good,created from vueblog.m_blog a join vueblog.m_category e on e.id = a.category_id where status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into vueblog.m_blog(user_id, title, content, description, status,category_id) values (#{userId},#{title},#{content},#{description},#{status},#{category.id})
